abstract: For those looking to flex their filming range without having to position their laptops atop various household objects, Ecamm Network has created the BT-1 Wireless Webcam.
snippet: For those looking to flex their filming range without having to position their laptops atop various household objects, Ecamm Network has created the BT-1 Wireless Webcam.
lead_paragraph: If the Mac versus PC ads are to be believed, it’s the tie-wearing PC that is rigid, not the more flexible denim-wearing Mac. Unfortunately, this mobility doesn’t extend to Apple’s built-in iSight Web camera, which is fine if your video needs are limited. But for those looking to flex their filming range without having to position their laptops atop various household objects, Ecamm Network has created the BT-1 Wireless Webcam for Macs.

headline.main: For Aspiring Spielbergs, Ecamm Creates Wireless Webcam for Macs
headline.print_headline: For Aspiring Spielbergs, Ecamm Creates Wireless Webcam for Macs
